mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.openid AS "openid", a.person_name AS "personName", a.idcard AS "idCard", a.phonenumber AS "phoneNumber", a.email AS "email", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info( id, openid, person_name, idcard, phonenumber, email, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{openid}, #{personName}, #{idCard}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET openid = #{openid}, person_name = #{personName}, idcard = #{idCard}, phonenumber = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
